fields.label: Does your business have customers that are Incorporated Associations?
Does your business have customers that are Unincorporated Associations?
Does your program include risk-based systems to be satisfied that the association exists?
fields.detail-label: Describe the risk-based systems and controls used to ensure the association exists.

fields.label: Does your program include procedures to collect the names of all members of the governing committee?
fields.detail-label: Describe the procedure for collecting names of governing committee members.

fields.label: Does your business collect the full name of the incorporated association?
Does your business collect the address of the association's principal place of administration, registered office, or the residential address of its public officer?
Does your business collect the unique identifying number issued to the association upon incorporation?
Does your business collect the full name of the chairman, secretary, and treasurer (or equivalent officers)?
Does your business collect the full name of the unincorporated association?
Does your business collect the full address of the unincorporated association's principal place of administration?
Does your business collect the full name of the chairman, secretary, and treasurer (or equivalent officers) of the unincorporated association?
Does your business collect the required KYC information for the member acting on behalf of the unincorporated association?
Does your program include risk-based systems to determine if additional KYC information should be collected for associations?
fields.detail-label: Describe the systems used to determine if additional KYC information is needed.

fields.label: Does your business verify the full name of the incorporated association?
Does your business verify the unique identifying number issued to the incorporated association?
Does your business verify the full name of the unincorporated association?
Does your business verify the identity of the member in accordance with individual identification procedures?
Does your program specify the reliable and independent sources used for verifying association information?
fields.detail-label: List the reliable and independent documents or data sources used for association verification.

fields.label: Does your program include systems and controls to respond to any discrepancies that arise during association verification?
fields.detail-label: Describe the procedure for resolving discrepancies found during the verification process.

groups.title: Part 4.6: Associations
groups.description: General identification requirements for incorporated and unincorporated associations.

groups.title: Incorporated Associations (Collection)
groups.description: Minimum information to be collected for incorporated associations.

groups.title: Unincorporated Associations (Collection)
groups.description: Minimum information to be collected for unincorporated associations.

groups.title: Unincorporated Associations (Verification)
groups.description: Verification requirements for unincorporated entities and their members.
